rComments: One of the best Lit classes I've take. Great material I'd never hear of, Michelle is an encouraging and thoughtful professor who is truly ideal. I always looked forward to class and reading, even though I had no background in subject and am pretty much a slacker. AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!

Great teacher.  Makes writing a lot less painful than it normally is.  The literature she chose was unique and interesting, and essay prompts are straightforward & she gives ample time to write them.  She leaves a lot of  comments on papers and is very accomodating.

Michelle Morton is by bar the best Writing professor I have had. The topic was about california and we read many interesting books. I do not read outside of school and enjoyed this class becasue it was engaging and helpful in improving my writing. Michelle is not hard as long as you show her you put effort. Office hours are very helpful. TAKE HER!!
Michelle is amazing!!!! She is so helpful and always in a good mood. She can help you grow as a wriiter and allow you to feel comfortable with any topic/style you want to attack. So awesome!
Michelle is such a great person and she really helps you out.  She gave me a lot of confidence in my writing.  Take Writing with Michelle, she's a blast and we read very good books.

By far the best teacher I've had at UCSC. I didn't want to take the class but she made it an excellent and enjoyable experience. The reading was good(a rare occurance), the papers were not to hard, and she gave excellent feedback. The class discussions were also good. I highly recommend her!

Michelle was great. I had an incredibly fun time in her class and always looked forward to going to class. She was really fun and happy all the time and she cared a lot about the progress of her students. She is the best writing teacher I've had and I would highly recommend taking writing 1 from her

Very good teacher, knows the material well, helpful, and is always in a good mood.  The readings were varied and kept my interest.  Grades papers easily/nicely.  Came in not wanting to take the course, but she made the class fun...reccomended

She is an amazing teacher and made the class a truly enjoyable experience. She facilitated discussions and brought the whole class together. The reading was light, and the essays were shorter than what is normally required. She makes learning fun and I would highly recommend taking writing1 with her
